, WINDSOR, Ontario( AP)- Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. ''We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.'' Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products

Defense Donald Rumsfeld Robert Gates will soon lift the ban on initiating new cases against Guantanamo detainees in preparation to increase the use of military commissions for prosecution. Imposed on the day of Barack Obama 's inauguration, the overturned ban will be accompanied by ''an executive order to create a parole board-like system'' to review cases of nearly 50 detainees who would be held without trial. begins its story with Donald Rumsfeld 's account about being told by President Bush , two weeks after the 9/11 attacks, to prepare review the Pentagon's plans for a war with Iraq. According to the Times: Two weeks after the worst terrorist attack in our nation's history, those of us in the Department of Defense were fully occupied, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld recalls. But the president insisted on new military plans for Iraq, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld writes. ''He wanted the options to be ''creative.'''
